sen.j: 『義経記』（ぎけいき）は、源義経とその主従を中心に書いた軍記物語で、南北朝時代 (日本)から室町時代初期に成立したと考えられている。
sen.e: "Gikeiki" is a war chronicle that mainly describes MINAMOTO no Yoshitsune and his retainers and it is considered to have been formed in the period of the Northern and Southern Courts (Japan) or at the beginning of the Muromachi Period.

"Gikeiki," a war chronicle that mainly describes MINAMOTO no Yoshitsune and his retainers, is thought to have been formed in the period of the Northern and Southern Courts (Japan) or at the beginning of the Muromachi period.
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: The "Gikeiki" is a war chronicle focused mainly on MINAMOTO no Yoshitsune and his retainers, and is believed to have been created either during the Nanbokucho period (Japan's period of Northern and Southern Courts) or at the beginning of the Muromachi period.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 能や歌舞伎、人形浄瑠璃など、後世の多くの文学作品に影響を与え、今日の義経やその周辺の人物のイメージの多くは『義経記』に準拠している。
sen.e: It gave influence on many literary works of the later period such as Noh, Kabuki and Ningyo joruri and many of current images of Yoshitsune and other persons around him are based on "Gikeiki."
It has influenced many literary works of the later period, such as Noh, Kabuki and Ningyo joruri, and many of the current images of Yoshitsune and other persons around him are based on "Gikeiki."
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: It has wielded considerable influence on many later literary works of Noh, Kabuki, and Ningyo Joruri among other genres, and many of the depictions of Yoshitsune and those connected to him that exist today are based on the "Gikeiki."
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 義経及びその主従などの登場人物たちがよく感情を表し、生き生きと書かれている。
sen.e: Yoshitsune and his retainers show their emotion, and they are described vividly.
Yoshitsune and his retainers show their emotions, and they are described vividly.
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: The figures in it, including Yoshitsune, his retainers, and other characters, often reveal their emotions, and are described in a very vivid manner.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: しかしながら彼らの死後二百年以上経ってからの成立であるため、『義経記』の作者は当事者たちの人柄を、直接的にも間接的にも知っていたとは考えられない。
sen.e: However, since it was formed more than two hundred years after their death, we cannot consider that the author of "Gikeiki" knew their personalities.
However, since it was written more than 200 years after their death, we cannot consider that the author of "Gikeiki" knew their personalities.
sen.cmt: n
sen.e: However, since it was written more than 200 years after all its main characters' deaths, it is impossible to believe that the creator of the "Gikeiki" actually had any sort of knowledge, either direct or indirect, of these historical figures' personalities.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: また、軍記物語の下地となりうる軍注記を利用したとも考えられていない。
sen.e: It is not considered that the author used Gunchuki that can be the basis of war chronicle.
sen.cmt: 「軍注記」はその意味が不明であり、「軍中記」 の誤りかとも考えられますが、確認できないため、「Gunchuki」と表記しました。
sen.e: It is not considered that the author used Gunchuki, which could be the basis of a war chronicle.
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: Nor is the author thought to have used Gunchuki, which can be and were often used as the basis for war chronicles.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: その上、作中の行動のあちこちに矛盾が生じており、当時の伝説と作者の創作によって成立したと考えられている。
sen.e: In addition, many contradictions are seen among actions in the story and, therefore, it is considered that it was formed with legends at that time and new creations by the author.
Additionally, many contradictions are seen throughout the action in the story, and therefore it is considered to have been based on legends of the time and new creations by the author.
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: Moreover, a great many contradictions surface during the action of the story, and hence it is believed to have been based on both then-contemporary legends and on fabrications by the author.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: よって「史料」としての価値は低く、今日ではあくまで「物語」として扱われている。
sen.e: Therefore, its value as "historical material" is low and, at present, it is treated as "story."
Therefore, its value as "historical material" is low, and currently it's treated as a "story."
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: As a result, its value as a "historical record" is considered low, and today it is treated as nothing more than a "story."
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 分類は軍記物語ではあるが、『平家物語』のように華々しい合戦の時期に重点が置かれているのではなく、義経の幼少期・出世・没落の時期に重点が置かれている。
sen.e: Although it is classified as a war chronicle, the focus is not on the period of appealing battles as in "Heike Monogatari" (The tale of the Heike), but on the period of Yoshitsune's infant stage, advancement and decline.

Although it's classified as a war chronicle, the focus isn't on the period of appealing battles as in "Heike Monogatari (The Tale of the Heike") but on the period of Yoshitsune's infancy, advancement and decline.
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: Although classified as a war chronicle, the Gikeiki, unlike the "Heike monogatari," is not actually focused on the period of Yoshitsune's magnificent battles, but rather on his childhood, his early successes, and his ruin.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: （実際、平家は合戦がはじまって数ページ程度で滅んでしまう）。
sen.e: (In fact, the Taira clan is overthrown within several pages after the battle commenced.)
(In fact, the Taira clan is overthrown within several pages after the commencement of battle).
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: (In fact, once battle is joined, the description continues only a few pages before the Taira clan is annihilated.)
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 言い換えれば、実在の合戦を話の軸として周りの人間模様を描いているというより、源義経という人物が話の軸となっている。
sen.e: In other words, it describes the personality of MINAMOTO no Yoshitsune as a core of the story rather than taking up actual battles as the core and describing the fabric of human relationship surrounding it.

In other words, it describes the personality of MINAMOTO no Yoshitsune as the core of the story rather than taking up actual battles as the core and describing the fabric of human relationships surrounding it.
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: In other words, the Gikeiki is centered on MINAMOTO no Yoshitsune's personality, not on the actual battles or on a description of the large-scale pattern of human involvement in them.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: まさにタイトル通り『義経記』である。
sen.e: It is "Gikeiki" just as it titled.
It is "Gikeiki," just as it is titled.
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: It truly is a record of Yoshitsune's life and character, just as the title suggests ("Gikeiki" means "Chronicle of Yoshitsune," "Gikei" being the Chinese reading of the characters for "Yoshitsune").
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 全体的に中世前期の他の軍記物語とは大きく趣が異なり、軍記物語というより伝奇物語とも言える。
sen.e: As a whole, it is different from other war chronicles of the beginning of the medieval times, and we can say that it is rather a tale of fantastic than a war chronicle.
As a whole, it is different from other war chronicles of the beginning of medieval times, and one can say it's somewhat a tale of the fantastic more than it is a war chronicle.
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: Overall, it differs greatly from other early medieval war chronicles; one might call it less a war chronicle and more a fictional romance.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。
